template.missing_node_name: [Missing Node Name] The template requires a nodeName property.
template.invalid_event_callback: [Invalid Event Callback] The callback must be a function.
template.change_missing_dom_fragment: [Change Missing Dom Fragment] A change to a proxy has fired for a missing fragment id.
template.mutation_missing_dom_fragment: [Mutation Missing Dom Fragment] A DOM mutation event was fired for a missing fragment id.
template.invalid_fragment_change_action: [Invalid Fragment Change Action] The DOM fragment change handler was fire with an invalid event action
template.element_path_missing: [Element Path Missing] The element path does not exist in the fragment's DOM tree

handlers.invalid_template_expression: [Invalid Template Expression] The handler requires a single expression.
handlers.missing_attributes: [Missing Attributes] The handler requires an attributes property
handlers.missing_expr_attribute: [Missing Expr Attribute] The handler requires an 'expr' attribute.
handlers.missing_text_property: [Missing Text Property] The handler requires a 'text' property.
handlers.invalid_iterator: [Invalid Iterator] The handler requires the result of the expression be an iterator.
handlers.missing_repeat_template: [Missing Repeat Template] The repeat template is missing from the map.
handlers.invalid_css_child: [Invalid CSS Child] CSS children must be a string.
handlers.missing_selectors: [Missing Selectors] The style tag is missing the selectors property.
handlers.missing_comment: [Missing Comment] The comment handler requires a comment property with the text of the comment
handlers.missing_text: [Missing Text] The text tag handler requires a text property
handlers.invalid_conditional_expression: [Invalid Conditional Expression] A conditional tag or attribute must hold a valid template expression
